Posts.Content: Hi, thanks for your reply it was very helpful. I have decided to have a mastectomy on my left side which will be on 11th December when they will also take some lymph nodes to test. I do have a named Breast Care nurse. Thanks for your help xx
Posts.Title: Looking for advice and information

Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with breast cancer last Friday and it has spread to the lymph nodes under my arm, seeing the surgeon tomorrow (Thursday 17th) has anyone else gone through the same and can you tellÂ  me your experience's pre and post op. Thank you Angela xx
